caption: I’m a doordash worker and today I was waiting for 2 orders 50 minutes , customer service cancelled the orders and plus manager kick everybody out of the store and said she was not going to make any orders anymore and customers were very mad and also they said they run out of tortillas and beans and then a lady in the middle of all this came with a case of cheese I think and I assume that they run out of cheese too, NEED NEW MANAGER 911, A REAL LEADER. I’ve BEEN a manager for 15 years all these things don’t happen in any location in the city , NO CONTROL ON DELIVERIES ALSO , call me if you want me to run your store , I do deliveries because also because I have to support my parents and I have to work hard.
The most unprofessional service and the slowest my order took 55min and got here cold
They gave me uncooked rice.  -_-. Hard as hell, can’t even eat it cus I might lose a tooth. Get it together!
WORST CHIPOTLE EVER! DO NOT BUY FROM HERE. CLOSE THIS CHIPOTLE DOWN, ITS TAKING UP SPACE.
Food not so bad, but service is terrible Organization skills 0

Idk why I keep trying to order from here. It’s consistently the worst Chipotle I’ve ever ordered from. I even tried to plan for the terrible service and somehow it just was worse. My last order was made at 5:45pm and promised for 6:15. I showed up at 6:30 assuming it would be late. Walked out at 7:05 to the smallest burrito I’ve ever eaten in a Chipotle. Kinda feels like they want it to fail.

Wait time was horrible with low grade customer service. Went a few Sundays and they closed early without any signs up or notification. They need better management skills and nicer security guards. Getting really tired of wasting my time and money in this place.
Waited a hour and half for my food

This chipotle opened about a month ago. I do not have an issue with the food...it's the service. First, they were accepting online orders only....cool..understandable. What I do not get is, if the order was placed at a particular time, why I have to wait another 30 mins at location for my order? About a week ago, they started to let people in ( a few at a time) but still a wait. Now, they are only opened until 2:00pm and weekends until 6ish. I am not sure what is going on here but they need to get it together.

I made a order online and was told it was ready for pick up. When I showed up I was told they where not accepting orders, and where closing at 8pm. This is outrageous, not only did I travel to this destination but there is a charge on my debit card for a order I dI'd not receive. There was a crowd of people waiting for their orders only to be told that , they do not understand why the app is accepting orders. No wonder this location has one star and bad ratings. So much for franchising and gentrification in the Bronx, people really enjoy your food but we also enjoy real authentic Mexican food. The taco truck down the block has you beat, on authenticity, customer service and they are actually open to take our business.

Very terrible service, ordered multiple times from here and all times my order was missing Guac or just made incorrectly, and had such small portions when I paid EXTRA for it and they refuse to give me a refund. They are better off opening the store rather than leaving things for takeout, because clearly whatever system they currently have isn’t working. On top of that the wait for food is insane, 30 minutes longer than what I intended for pickup sometimes even longer. Better off going to fordham’s chipotle or literally any other ones than this one.

Service is very poor! I placed an order online,paid for it ,and when I came to pick it up there was a crowd of people arguing who couldn’t get the order. The employee from Chipotle came after 10 minutes and said that all customers should just call customer service for refund as they were not able to get the orders ready.  I never got the order for each I paid!

Horrible! If I could give this place zero stars I would. We ordered online and went to pick up the order. I was told the system was down and we weren't getting our order. There were 10 other people standing outside waiting for their orders. The manager came out and said to call corporate to cancel the order and get a refund. Good luck finding an actual phone number to request a refund. There was no one to talk to and you have to text with a robot. Think twice before ordering from here.
I FOUND GLASS AT THE BOTTOM OF MY ORDER AND THEY MESSED UP MY ORDER TWICE ITS BEEN 3 weeks and I’m still waiting for supposed return
The food comes cold even when you arrive before it's made. The chicken burrito  even when ordered with extra meat you can't find it.

Went 2 weeks ago for dinner and chose a 730 pickup. I got there and waited with a bunch of other people out in the cold. They kept telling me my order was not ready yet. Over an hour passed by before they admitted that my order never showed up on their end, mind you it was FREEZING outside! I was told the manager would come out and "discuss" our options, she came out and just took a picture of our order. We got it 5 mins later but with no apology from the manager.  All they did was throw in free chips and guac... ended up getting my food closer to 8:45.  Will not be coming back. There's a perfectly good Taco Bell across the street and a Chipotle in Fordham.
If you are vegetarian, skip this place, I ordered a veggie rice bowl and there was an alarming amount of beef and chicken mixed in.
best time i have ever had here the food was on,time
This food is horrible,my food came in cold.they don’t answer the phone.
The store is digital only at the time being but it’ takes forever to receive food .. when it comes out it’s super cold .
no management.take forever to get the order.
Nasty service, very slow, u have to white an hr for ur food , i ordered my food 30mins before ive arrived still wasnt ready, just might as well close this location,

Oh wow look at the rating. Doordash need to take them off they app. Just ordered from here got my food. wanted a burrito got a bowl. nothing I wanted in the bowl. should of check the review. after a long day of work & not eating nothing this is what I get thanks.
That’s from chipotle disguising
Great food had no problems with my order

Wish I could give this place zero star's for horrible wait time and for food coming out cold. I ordered a steak bowl at 3:15 pm and promised time was at 3:30 pm for pick up. My food was not ready until 3:53 pm and it came out cold. Let me inform you there were also about 15 people waiting outside for their order's because this location was 15 minutes behind on every order.

My first time ordering from this place was the worst experience I ever had with chipotle worst than the one on Fordham. The food was watery the portion was very little & cheap, and the food was cold, one of the bowls was missing the cauliflower rice. It was horrible for there first day opened. Then I order chipotle again hoping it’s coming from another location I’ll take Fordham over them, but unknowingly the food came from here unfortunately. The food looked better than the first time but it was still bad the portion was still cheap it barely had anything not even a scoop of anything it was like a tablespoon. The food was cold when it arrived and they forgot one of the drinks, I ordered two drinks they only put one drink in the bag. The chips was way to salty I couldn’t even eat them. I’m never ordering delivery again if they going to keep having this place make my food. No thanks. This is the worst chipotle ever.

Portions are very small compared to other locations, food is very cold when served & staff are very rude on the phone. What makes it worse is that the chipotle app is only picking this location for delivery when I have two other locations that are much closer to my location. Avoid this location & call customer service if the app isn’t allowing you to chose your restaurant of choice.

Wow, the worst Chipolte ever.  Was so excited to see when the sign went up that a Chipolte was coming to our area.  Is there a way of giving a minus zero review.  You place your order and still have to wait 20 to 30 minutes over expected time.  Was the order correct, nope not as requested.  As someone else indicated, the amount served is ridiculous compared to other locations.  I’ll take my business back to Bay Plaza or Pelham, NY. Come on Chipolte you can do better than this!
the service is very slow

You can only order on the app, which I did 30mins before arriving. When I arrived I had to wait an additional 30mins outside in the freezing cold with a bunch of other upset customers. I only ordered chips & guac btw. Horrible and slow service.

Absolutely terrible service, my order was supposed to be ready at 2:30. It was handed to me at 3:00, 30 minutes late. missing items & both orders made incorrectly. The portions are tiny & not worth the extra wait in the cold.
Took 2 hours to make a bowl
Its take forever to get your food !

They were real cheap with the food the burrito bowl was almost empty i had to dig to find the litle bit of meat they put and only like 3 pieces of lettuce dissapointing after waiting 20 mins outside past the pick up time . Smh !!
Great Burrito
